array.string: Expenses directly associated with production of goods or services. Excludes depreciation, depletion, amortization, and SG&A
Research costs without regard to immediate commercial application. Development takes research to a marketable stage.
Includes all salaries, indirect production, marketing and general corporation expenses
Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization
Total net income from all sources divided by weighted average common shares outstanding
Net cash from continuing operations + net cash from discontinuing operations
Net sale/purchase of property, plant, equipment + net sale/purchase of short-term investments
Cash from operations minus purchase of plant, property and equipment minus cash dividends.
Net stock issuance/repayment + net debt issuance minus cash dividends and financing charges
Short term liquid assets + long term assets
Total short term liabilities + total long term liabilities
Portion of net income retained for reinvestment instead of being paid out as dividends
Preferred stock equity plus common stock equity
Common equity divided by common shares outstanding. A margin of safety exists when book value > stock price.
Book value minus intangible assets, divided by common shares outstanding
Total if all sources of conversion (convertible bonds and stock options) were exercised
